text: Having earned his colours with Prince Tyrion in the Blood Island campaign, Althran Stormrider has accepted the thankless task of leading the expeditionary forces of the Citadel of Dusk. The Citadel itself is a site of tremendous strategic importance, controlling the trade routes to Cathay whilst suppressing any threats to Ulthuan. The expeditionary forces grip on the region has been decaying for centuries and any further losses will see Althran ostracized like his predecessor. The Prince means to prove he is worthy of the ‘Stormrider’ name but few can claim to have found glory in the choking jungles of Lustria, and he must do so alone...
